title: Cast Lulu Polymorph on Elise and it went on Cooldown and she still Cast her E.

replies.body: I cast it on vi 3 times in a game I just had, not sure if it went on cool down, but she didn't polymorph. bug?

> [{quoted}](name=SoulFiria,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9EMnoQnd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-17T03:09:59.444+0000)
>
> I cast it on vi 3 times in a game I just had, not sure if it went on cool down, but she didn't polymorph. bug?

Was it during her ultimate?

her e has a slight delay, like .25 sec and lulu has a .05 (cast time, then like another 0.25 travel time)or something like that, and her e was already cast when you used the spell, so technically it worked like it should
lulu is e is a projectile(whimsy) actually travels to the target to do the cc
